<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Splits control flow at point of \\p Guard, replacing it with explicit branch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// by the condition of guard&#39;s first argument. The taken branch then goes to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the block that contains  \\p Guard&#39;s successors, and the non-taken branch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// goes to a newly-created deopt block that contains a sole call of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// deoptimize function \\p DeoptIntrinsic.  If &#39;UseWC&#39; is set, preserve the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// widenable nature of the guard by lowering to equivelent form.  If not set,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// lower to a form without widenable semantics.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a27aee52717271be9e79135bfaab890ce">makeGuardControlFlowExplicit</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;DeoptIntrinsic, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;Guard,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseWC);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
